A word of explanation.  My study of armor in Japan begins in the Muromachi 
Period, so I am relatively unaware of details of armor in preceding eras. As to 
why arm protection was phased out,  as Japan arguably entered its most violent 
era,  is a question whose answer would be difficult indeed.  My SO is  a whiz 
on Japan,  I believe she lived there, so I might ask her sometime.  As 
always,  great pleasure in talking to you,  Tom.  Jack
